mapper.select: SELECT space.`name`,`schedule`.date,schedule_slot.begin_time,schedule_slot.duration,booking_record.application,booking_record.is_active,booking_record.has_check_in from schedule_slot INNER JOIN `schedule` ON schedule_slot.schedule_id=`schedule`.id INNER JOIN space ON `schedule`.space_id = space.id INNER JOIN booking_record ON schedule_slot.booking_record_id = booking_record.id WHERE `schedule`.date >= #{0}
